docs.lead_paragraph: Google will raise the salaries of gay and lesbian employees whose partners receive domestic partner benefits, to compensate them for a tax they pay that heterosexual married couples do not.

docs.lead_paragraph: The government program that gives life-sustaining drugs to people with H.I.V. or AIDS who cannot afford them has seen its waiting list rise sharply.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- They grilled her on her handling of military recruitment at Harvard Law School. They highlighted how, as an aide to President Bill Clinton, she helped edit a medical group's statement to strengthen support for the procedure critics call partial-birth abortion. They painted her as a partisan and suggested she would be too deferential to Congress when reviewing the constitutionality of sweeping legislation, like President Obama's landmark health care law.

headline.main: In 2nd Day of Quizzing, Kagan Sticks to Script

docs.abstract: Republicans press Solicitor General Elena Kagan on various issues but are not able to knock her off stride during second day of questioning at her Supreme Court confirmation hearing; photo (M)
